summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Justice outlines 15 open recommendations that it should prioritize. The recommendations relate to combating illicit opioid use, managing the federal prison system, countering domestic terrorism, improving information technology and cybersecurity, and addressing...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Justice
